20110106000848.000|20110106000850.000|CC1|A BUNCH OF CHRISTMAS PRESENTS   
20110106000850.000|20110106000852.000|CC1|HAD BEEN WAITING FOR ME AT THE  
20110106000852.000|20110106000854.000|CC1|HOUSE, AND AS I MENTIONED, I

20110106000858.000|20110106000859.000|CC1|I NEVER UNDERSTOOD WHY PEOPLE   
20110106000859.000|20110106000901.000|CC1|LOVED FOOTBALL SO MUCH.         
20110106000901.000|20110106000902.000|CC1|AND, OF COURSE, WHEN THE SAINTS 
20110106000902.000|20110106000903.000|CC1|WON THE SUPER BOWL LAST YEAR, I 
20110106000903.000|20110106000905.000|CC1|WAS LIKE NOW I LOVE FOOTBALL.

20110106001459.000|20110106001502.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20110106001502.000|20110106001502.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or

20110106001511.000|20110106001514.000|CC1|     fatal, were reported.      
20110106001514.000|20110106001514.000|CC1|Signs include abdominal pain and
20110106001514.000|20110106001517.000|CC1| yellowing of the skin or eyes.
